name: Karla Lazarte
bio: I am a passionate and solution-driven Software Engineer who enjoys working with team members of all backgrounds and skill sets. I am interested in creative projects that provide intuitive and user-friendly solutions and aim to make a positive impact on the digital world. Based on my prior experience as a Wellness Program Manager, I understand the importance of clear and straightforward communication. I seamlessly bring this skill into the field of software engineering, recognizing how crucial it is to collaborate effectively with teammates, stakeholders, and end-users.
